User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the byeFat application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

Username.title: Username
Username.description: Used to enforce username uniqueness. The document ID is the username.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this username.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a food product with its nutritional information per 100g.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product entity.

caloriesPer100g.description: Number of calories per 100 grams of the product.

fatPer100g.description: Amount of fat in grams per 100 grams of the product.

carbsPer100g.description: Amount of carbohydrates in grams per 100 grams of the product.

proteinPer100g.description: Amount of protein in grams per 100 grams of the product.

creatorId.description: The UID of the user who created the product.

creatorUsername.description: The username of the user who created the product.

likes.description: Number of users who confirmed the nutritional information.

likedBy.description: List of user IDs who liked this product.

barcode.description: The EAN/UPC barcode of the product, if applicable.

source.description: How the product was added to the database.

DailyLog.title: DailyLog
DailyLog.description: Represents a user's daily food consumption log, with snapshotted goals.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DailyLog entity (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).

date.description: The date of the log in YYYY-MM-DD format.

goalCalories.description: The user's calorie goal for this specific day.

goalFat.description: The user's fat goal for this specific day.

goalCarbs.description: The user's carbohydrate goal for this specific day.

goalProtein.description: The user's protein goal for this specific day.

consumedCalories.description: The total calories consumed for this specific day.

DailyLogItem.title: DailyLogItem
DailyLogItem.description: Represents a single food item consumed within a daily log.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log item.

productName.description: Denormalized name of the product for display.

grams.description: The amount of the product consumed in grams.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the item was logged.

DailyLogActivity.title: DailyLogActivity
DailyLogActivity.description: Represents a single activity performed within a daily log.

id.description: Unique identifier for the activity log item.

name.description: Name of the activity (e.g., Running, Weightlifting).

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the activity was logged.

WeightEntry.title: WeightEntry
WeightEntry.description: Represents a single weight measurement for a user on a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the weight entry.

date.description: The date of the weight measurement in YYYY-MM-DD format.

definition.description: Global collection for all food products.
Subcollection to store daily summary logs for a user. The ID is the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Subcollection to store individual food items logged for a specific day.
Subcollection to store individual activities logged for a specific day.
Subcollection to store a user's weight history over time.
